<img width="500" alt="CodeMirror6" src="thumbnail.jpg"/>

## How to run demo

At project root, run below command to start Yorkie and Envoy proxy.

```bash
$ docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up --build -d
```

Install dependencies

```bash
$ npm install
```

Start demo project

```bash
$ npm run dev
```
